message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $10000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're still looking to save some more, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000. I've already met you halfway, and I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. I'll offer you the product for $11100. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
